CustomField.description: If checked, a dash will be used as the file name and number separator. i.e if file.pdf already exist new file name will be file-1.pdf.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If checked, a dash will be used as the file name and number separator. i.e if file.pdf already exist new file name will be file-1.pdf.
CustomField.label: Use Dash as File Number Separator
